titleStmt.title: The princes prayers. The first and second part. Contayning Christian and zealous meditations for euery day in the weeke, morning and euening
Christliche Gebet. English
titleStmt.author: Habermann, Johann, 1516-1590.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected, enlarged, and much more perfected then before.

publicationStmt.publisher: imprinted by Iohn Windet, for Ieffrie Chorleton,

notesStmt.note: A translation of a French translation of: Habermann, Johann. Christliche Gebet.
R10 is blank except for marginal rules; R12 is blank.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
